elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Ask your training company and compare the information you receive on data backup.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which data is backed up daily in your teaching company, which only weekly or even less frequently? Why? Make a note of any interesting details.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What type of data backup is carried out for daily data in your teaching company? Describe the procedure, the backup media and the type of data backup. Make a note of important findings and reasons for their use and procedure.
